text: Mark off the width and height of the picture. Add guidelines for Gaara’s body. Draw the shape of his head and draw a line through it.
Add guidelines for the guy’s arms, feet and facial features.
Outline the shapes for Gaara’s arms, trousers, eyes and ears.
Draw Gaara’s fingers, pupils, shoes, clothes, hair and a bag.
Detail his hair. Add a cloak and toes. Detail the clothes, bag and eyes.
Work on the figure, paying special attention to detail.
Contour Gaara, trying to vary the thickness and darkness of the line. Add more detail. Erase all guidelines.
